name: CLYDE: The Untold Story
description:
Forget everything about the propaganda of the Pacmen...Here's how it really happened

Experience the untold story of Clyde, the last survivor of his tribe after a Pacmen assault, try to escape from their evil claws!

This game was made for the Major Jam : Retro, enjoy! :D

(For unknown reasons, Unity would break every single Web build, so I wasn't able to do it, sorry! :'( )

The music is by Sir Aragar
